metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28018 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Use After Free in smtp_reset in certainsituations that may be common for builds with OpenSSL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
exim4-base - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
exim4-config - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
exim4-daemon-light - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
eximon4 - 4.93-13ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.93-13ubuntu1.5').
